item.title: Fabian add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Now is the winter of our discontent Made glorious summer by this sun of York; And all the clouds that lour'd upon our house In the deep bosom of the ocean buried." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Alan Dean Foster
item.description: "Freedom is just chaos with better lighting" -- Alan Dean Foster

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Warhammer 40 000 Source Book
item.description: "There is no time to plan, there is no space to think. No respite. No forgiveness. There is only war." -- Warhammer 40 000 Source Book

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Though much is taken, much abides; and though We are not now that strength which in old days Moved earth and heaven, that which we are, we are; One equal temper of heroic hearts, Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "News is unusual things happening— And usual things happening [...] But news is mainly what someone somewhere doesn't want you to put in the paper— Except that sometimes it isn't [...] News, [...] all depends. But you'll know it when you see it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "I'm sure it's all journalism [...] It means it's true enough for now." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "You know zat another term for an iconographer would be ‘photographer’? From the old word ‘photus’ in Latation, vhich means—” “‘To prance around like an idiot ordering everyone about as if you owned the place,’” said William. “Ah, you know it!" -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win." -- Stephen King

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "That which you mistake for madness is but an overacuteness of the senses." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Fabian add a quote by Otto von Bismarck
item.description: "Fools learn from experience. I prefer to learn from the experience of others." -- Otto von Bismarck
